payload.name: kernel-fusion
payload.title: Kernel fusion: reduce memory round-trips
payload.formal: fuse ops to avoid writing intermediate tensors to memory.
payload.apm2_mapping: in APM2, “fusion” means: avoid multi-step parse→validate→transform passes over the same data. Canonicalize once, validate once, hash once, store once, then only ship references. Evidence and CAC pipelines already push in this direction. Make it explicit: one pass from untrusted input to canonical form + receipt.
